etymology.interpretation: The character 角(角) (jiǎo, "horn") visually represents the distinctive shape of an animal's horn.

examples.chinese: 牛角是一种坚固的天然武器(牛角是一種堅固的天然武器)。
examples.pinyin: niú jiǎo shì yī zhǒng jiān gù de tiān rán wǔ qì。
examples.english: Cow horns are sturdy natural weapons.

examples.chinese: 鹿角丰富了森林的传说(鹿角豐富了森林的傳說)，象征着自由与力量(象徵著自由與力量)。
examples.pinyin: lù jiǎo fēng fù le sēn lín de chuán shuō, xiàng zhēng zhe zì yóu yǔ lì liàng。
examples.english: Deer antlers enrich the legends of the forest and symbolize freedom and strength.

examples.chinese: 犀牛角在古代被视作珍贵药材(犀牛角在古代被視作珍貴藥材)。
examples.pinyin: xī niú jiǎo zài gǔ dài bèi shì zuò zhēn guì yào cái。
examples.english: Rhinoceros horns were regarded as precious medicinal materials in ancient times.
